name: Lickety Splits
description:
Play with 2 or 3 friends as cowboys in a competition for who is the rootin'est and/or tootin' est.

You need game-pads to play this game, Xbox 360 remotes are recommended.

Press start to continue through tutorial pages and after each round.

CREDITS:

Programming & Design: Ben Welsh

Design & Asset creation: Toby Welsh

Art: Kate Lulham
